name: @keystonejs-contrib/example-with-ckeditor
description: An example KeystoneJS project showcasing a Blogging Site using View and express view engine pug.
author: The KeystoneJS-Contrib Community Development Team

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="-r dotenv/config" DISABLE_LOGGING=true keystone dev
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="-r dotenv/config" DISABLE_LOGGING=true  keystone start
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="-r dotenv/config"  keystone build
